title: 'Better than orginal scotch tape for walls'

title: 'Not worth it'
body: I used this tape to stick wall poster and by evening they keep falling down. Its adhesive power is very poor and can't even hold a piece of paper. It is easy to remove and do not leave stains on wall. It is not transparent and kind of translucent white color. I did not fulfill my purpose and was total waste of money

title: 'might as well have gotten off brand scotch tape'
body: This tape had one job: to hold up some silly little sheets of paper on a wall. It failed miserably though. If you searching for the equivalent of a less sticky original scotch tape for some reason, then go ahead and buy it. Honestly though, the most this tape can hold up is half an A4 size sheet of printing paper. Otherwise it's not gonna hold up. Def wouldn't buy again
